actions.text: On agreeing to the Posey amendment (A036) Agreed to by recorded vote: 230 - 193 (Roll no. 392).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A036) offered by Mr. Posey.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Posey amendment (A036) Agreed to by recorded vote: 230 - 193 (Roll no. 392).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

description: Amendment to prohibit the use of funds under this Act from being used to implement, administer, enforce, or codify into regulation, the SEC's guidance relating to "Commission Guidance Regarding Disclosure Related to Climate Change".
purpose: An amendment numbered 44 printed in House Report 114-639 to prohibit the use of funds under this Act from being used to implement, administer, enforce, or codify into regulation, the SEC's guidance relating to 'Commission Guidance Regarding Disclosure Related to Climate Change'.
